README.html.title: SnakeGame | SnakeGame
README.html.summary: SnakeGame A simple Snake game built with WPF in C#. 📌 Features Control the snake using arrow keys Generate food and increase score Collision detection (walls & self-collision) Dynamic speed increase Game Over display 🚀 Installation Requirements Visual Studio with .NET support .NET 6 or later Clone & Run the Project git clone https://github.com/your-user/snakegame.git cd snakegame Open the SnakeGame.sln file in Visual Studio. Press F5 to start the game. 🎮 Controls ⬆️ Up ⬇️ Down ⬅️ Left ➡️ Right 📜 License This project is licensed under the MIT License. See the LICENSE file for more details.
